${ModID}:ThornBall.NAME: Thorn Ball
${ModID}:ThornBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to your starlight:Barbs.

${ModID}:StickySap.NAME: Sticky Sap
${ModID}:StickySap.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! starlight:Tangled. NL Apply !M! starlight:Wet. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SolarBlade.NAME: Solar Blade
${ModID}:SolarBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals unblocked damage, apply !M! starlight:Burn.

${ModID}:VineBomb.NAME: Vine Bomb
${ModID}:VineBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! starlight:Tangled to ALL enemies. Deals additional damage equal to your starlight:Barbs.

${ModID}:Sanctuary.NAME: Sanctuary
${ModID}:Sanctuary.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to {!M!|>1=!M! times }your starlight:Barbs.{@@}

${ModID}:ToxicBarbs.NAME: Toxic Barbs
${ModID}:ToxicBarbs.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! starlight:Barbs. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:LeafStorm.NAME: Leaf Storm
${ModID}:LeafStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Deals double damage to starlight:Burning enemies.

${ModID}:Bloom.NAME: Bloom
${ModID}:Bloom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, gain !M! starlight:Barb{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.
